description: ?Big John: 'Power Machine'? ? The legendary John ?Wad? Holmes has the king-sized tool everybody else's meat is measured by! In this vintage solo performance, John works those famous 12 1/2 inches to a hefty climax while straddling the sleek form of a powerful motorcycle.
series: Black Velvet - The Big Deal Part 1
title: Black Velvet - The Big Deal Part 1, Scene #03
